Class TCPServerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloud.jgo.net.tcp.TCPServerConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HTTPServerConfiguration, TCPLoginServerConfiguration

    public class TCPServerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configuration
    Author:
    Martire91
    TCP server configuration, and is an implementation of Server
